item.title: Spacer Girls
item.author: stevebeadle@posteo.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: More head studies in Krita. I think of this kind of thing as digital sketchbook work. Space seemed to be the way to go for experimenting with a brighter colour palette. Related 2023-08-19 Head Practice Girl Study in Krita

item.title: 2023-08-19 Head Practice
item.author: stevebeadle@posteo.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Head practice. I’ve been having a tough time with hair-do’s and beards. I can get absolutely lost in them sometimes and never feel like the painting is finished. Much like real hair do’s I suppose, you’ve got to set a time limit on how long you can fiddle around with it and then just move on and get out the house. Related Girl Study in Krita The North Water

item.title: Girl Study in Krita
item.author: stevebeadle@posteo.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Digital painting study of a girl in Krita. I often take this approach of making a monochrome underpainting and laying colour on top once I’ve got some solid values in place. Related Posts Shadow of the Vampire Study Smokey and Michelle The North Water
